Name: BlindMaze
About the game: You are inside a maze, but you cannot see the maze, you only can see your position inside the maze, use your memory to keep the track of the maze and reach the goal. Keys: You only can move horizontal or vertical (not diagonal) The indicator of your position turns red when you touch a wall Non-Linear gameplay, you can skip some levels if you want to.
